meanings.definition: A flat surface on a truck or trailer for carrying goods or equipment.
meanings.sent1: The workers loaded the heavy boxes onto the flatbed.
meanings.sent2: The farmer used the flatbed to transport hay bales from the field.
meanings.sent3: The flatbed turned into a makeshift stage for the impromptu concert.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a flatbed, carrying memories of a distant past.
meanings.sent5: The bright red flatbed stood out among the other vehicles in the parade.

meanings.definition: A type of scanner that has a flat glass surface for scanning documents.
meanings.sent1: The office purchased a new flatbed for scanning important papers.
meanings.sent2: She placed the document carefully on the flatbed of the scanner.
meanings.sent3: The flatbed scanner seemed to have a mind of its own, beeping unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: His eyes scanned her face like a flatbed, capturing every detail.
meanings.sent5: The flatbed scanner hummed softly as it worked its magic on the paper.

meanings.definition: A type of printer that has a flat surface for placing paper to be printed on.
meanings.sent1: The teacher used the flatbed printer to make copies of the worksheet.
meanings.sent2: He carefully aligned the paper on the flatbed of the printer.
meanings.sent3: The flatbed printer decided to take a break right before the deadline.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like a flatbed printer, churning out emotions onto the page.
meanings.sent5: The flatbed printer whirred to life, ready to bring the digital image to paper.
